Text:
Thanxx! Ram.

I'll keep it to seed. :)

Well, I'm back to say thanx again. Actually, I just saw the complete Series just now. ;)

And, i'd like to advise to all to must read George Orwell's 1984 before (or after) watching the last episode, "Vengeance". You could easily understand the 'Stalinism". That was worse than Hitler. 

Thanx again.
